subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=yán
|c=jin4,ngaan4
|c_note=jin4 - literary; ngaan4 - vernacular (“to grind”)
|h=pfs=ngân/ngiên
|md=ngiēng/ngiĕng
|md_note=ngiēng - vernacular; ngiĕng - literary (used in {{zh-l|*研究}})
|mn=gián/xm,kh,tn,sx,yl,hc,tc:géng/qz,lk:ngúi/zz,mg:gán/tp,km:ngái
|mn_note=gián - literary; géng/nguí/gán/ngái - vernacular
|mn-t=ngiêng2/ngiang2/ngiêng5/ngiang5/ngoin2
|mn-t_note=ngiêng2/ngiang2/ngiêng5/ngiang5 - literary (ngiêng2/ngiêng5 - Chaozhou); ngoin2 - vernacular
|w=1'nyi
|mc=y
|oc=y,1
|cat=v
}}
